title: Patch Closure
description: Schema for patch closure sprint calibration artifact. Tracks patch status for validated HIGH/MED findings.

id.description: Alternative to finding_id for backward compatibility

unseen_override.description: True if unseen exploit gate failure overrode this finding's status to insufficient

patches.description: Patch entries for each validated finding

exploits_blocked.description: True if all exploit tests are now blocked by patches

passed.description: Number of exploit tests that passed (= exploit blocked)

failed.description: Number of exploit tests that failed (= exploit succeeded)

error.description: Error message if test harness failed

unseen_exploit_test.description: EVMbench ยง3.2.2 unseen exploit test results. Gate blocks unless exploits_blocked=true.

forge_test.description: Forge test verification results for patches

overall_verdict.description: Overall patch closure verdict (e.g. ALL_PATCHED, SOME_INSUFFICIENT)

unseen_override.description: True if unseen exploit gate failure caused fail-closed override of all patch statuses
